properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: HMAC-SHA256 signing secret for JWT tokens. Must be at least 32 characters.

properties.name: app.jwt.ttl-seconds
properties.description: JWT token time-to-live in seconds. Default: 604800 (7 days).

properties.name: app.totp.issuer
properties.description: Issuer name shown in TOTP authenticator apps.

properties.name: app.totp.challenge-ttl-seconds
properties.description: 2FA login challenge expiry in seconds. Default: 300.

properties.name: app.totp.setup-ttl-seconds
properties.description: 2FA setup session expiry in seconds. Default: 600.

properties.name: app.totp.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum 2FA code verification attempts before lockout. Default: 5.

properties.name: app.totp.clock-skew-steps
properties.description: Number of 30-second TOTP windows to allow for clock skew. Default: 1.

properties.name: app.totp.encryption-key
properties.description: AES encryption key for storing TOTP secrets. Defaults to app.jwt.secret.

properties.name: app.template.lab-id
properties.description: Lab ID used as the onboarding template source. Default: admin1.

properties.name: app.edit-pin
properties.description: PIN required to edit or reopen a COMPLETED patient record.

properties.name: app.frontend.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the frontend, used in email verification and reset links.

properties.name: app.mail.enabled
properties.description: Whether email sending is enabled. Default: true.

properties.name: app.mail.from
properties.description: From address used in outgoing emails.
